channel.title: Buying from shop problem/bug 508
channel.description:
On my server I have finally found out how to add shops :) but whenever I try to buy something it doesn't work. It pauses for about 3 seconds then reloads the client and I'm still logged in. I would really appreciate help with this, and would eventually like to be able to have fully working shops. :)
If it helps my source/base is this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html If anyone thinks this source is quite bad/buggy please could anyone redirect me to a better 508?
Thanks

item.title: Buying from shop problem/bug 508
